content: nothing says winter like a warm cozy shawl but there s no reason it needs to be plain the points in the design are reminiscent of the petals of a flower and the greater than a semi-circle shape lends itself well to wrapping making it a great way to brighten up your winter wardrobe there is a small typo in row 28 the errata is as follows row 28 chain 3 double_crochet in next st chain 2 double_crochet in next st 4 times chain 2 v-st in next st chain 2 double_crochet in next st 4 times chain 2 double_crochet in next st 2d double_crochet in next st chain 2 double_crochet in next st 4 times chain 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space chain 2 double_crochet in next st 4 times chain 2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn
